decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The development hereby permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

Condition : 2 - The proposed development shall be carried out in all respects in accordance with the proposals contained in the application and the plans submitted (399/P/03/04, 399/P/03/03, 399/P/03/02, 399/P/03/01, 399/P/01/05, 399/P/01/04, 399/P/01/03, 399/P/01/02, 399/E/03/03, 399/E/01/03, 399/E/01/02, 397/E/01/01 (Received 24/12/2014). 399/E/03/02, 399/E/03/01 (Received 04/02/2015)) therewith and approved by the Local Planning Authority, or as shall have been otherwise agreed in writing by the Local Planning Authority before the building is used.
Condition : 3 - The materials to be used in the construction of the external surfaces of the extension hereby permitted shall match those used in the existing building.
description: Erection of front, side and rear roof extensions and raising the roof ridge to the house
